hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"If the Prophet (ﷺ)" - (one of the narrators) 'Amr said: "If the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ)" - "wanted to eat or sleep while he was Junub, he would perform Wudu'." In his narration, 'Amr (one of the narrators) added: "Wudu' was for prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب وُضُوءِ الْجُنُبِ إِذَا أَرَادَ أَنْ يَأْكُلَ
chapter.eng-name: The Junub Person Performing Wudu' When He Wants To Eat
